THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON

09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE

FOLLOWING :

ORDER
Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C.

2. The petitioner is the accused in CC No. 198 of
2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class
Magistrate Court-I, Pala. He prays that the
learned magistrate be directed to dispose of
the case without further delay.

3. I have perused Annexure A copy of the
proceedings sheet of the trial court. The case
is ripe for trial. The learned magistrate has
already issued summons to CW1 to CW12. Having
regard to these facts, I am inclined to allow
the request of the petitioner.

In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The
learned magistrate is directed to dispose of
